name: VedEx Delivery
description:
The hero is a "down to earth" guy who works in a delivery service. Everything changes when ...

Controls:

Mouse/Sticks - Look Up, WASD - Move, E - Interact, E & Q - Down or Up (Car). Supports gamepad.

This game created for Epic Megajam 2019 with theme "Down-To-Earth".

I used Unreal Engine, Blender and Houdini.
